title: 【紧急更新】1.9.0版本发布，校园网优化
title_en: [Urgent Update] Version 1.9.0 Released, Optimized for Campus Network
content: 【紧急更新】亲爱的用户，为了提升您在校园网中的使用体验，我们特别推出了1.9.0版本。请尽快前往应用商城更新，以享受更加流畅和稳定的服务。
content_en: [Urgent Update]Dear users, to enhance your experience on the campus network, we have released version 1.9.0. Please update to this version as soon as possible for a smoother and more stable service.
